original_text: And they shall be upon Aaron, and upon his sons, when they come in unto the tabernacle of the congregation, or when they come near unto the altar to minister in the holy place; that they bear not iniquity, and die: it shall be a statute for ever unto him and his seed after him.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들이 회막에 들어갈 때에나 제단에 가까이 하여 거룩한 곳에서 섬길 때에 그것들을 입어야 죄를 짊어진 채 죽지 아니하리니 그와 그의 후손이 영원히 지킬 규례니라

sentences.original_text: And they shall be upon Aaron

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아들들 위에 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: when they come in unto the tabernacle of the congregation
or when they come near unto the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들이 제단 가까이 올 때

sentences.original_text: to minister in the holy place
it shall be a statute for ever
unto him and his seed after him
